entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whati
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:10 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
